prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon that resembles a small bird with vibrant colors and friendly expression.
I want a Pokemon that has a round body shape and can be found in urban areas, with colorful feathers.
Generate a cute Normal/Flying type Pokemon that is known for its agility and speed while flying.
Make a Pokemon that has brown and cream colors, with a distinctive tail and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a bird-like Pokemon with the ability to soar high in the sky, showcasing its impressive wingspan.
Design a small Pokemon that loves to gather in forests and is often seen chirping happily.
Show me a basic evolution flying Pokemon with a gentle personality, commonly found in grasslands.
